comments.content:
Their sample looks pretty lame.  
It just doesn't have that _trippin'_ feel.  
When you do "sixties" style while "straight" it just looks like boring "seventies" stuff ;-)

This lettering pales in comparison to what those poster artists were doing back then. The rave scene also had some pretty unique lettering.

I wonder what those two things had in common?

It was a different "state" of mind like Norbert said. Fun while it lasted, which was about 8 hours or so if I remember correctly. :)

peace
Can a computer generated typeface replicate the hand drawn considered genius of Wes Wilson?
